Instruction: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 40 minutes. Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Bake in the preheated oven for approximately 40 to 45 minutes, or until golden and set.
